getPrompt().Description: Prefer @B_android#service#voice#VoiceInteractionSession#PickOptionRequest#getVoicePrompt_E@ which allows multiple voice prompts. Return the prompt informing the user of what they are picking, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest_E@.
getPrompt().history: Added in API level 23 Deprecated in API level 23

getVoicePrompt().Description: Return the prompt informing the user of what they are picking, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest_E@.

getOptions().Description: Return the set of options the user is picking from, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest_E@.

sendIntermediatePickOptionResult(android.Description: Report an intermediate option selection from the request, without completing it (the request is still active and the app is waiting for the final option selection), resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest#onPickOptionResult_E@ with false for finished.
sendIntermediatePickOptionResult(android.FullName: public void sendIntermediatePickOptionResult (Option[] selections, Bundle result)

sendPickOptionResult(android.app.VoiceIn.Description: Report the final option selection for the request, completing the request and resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest#onPickOptionResult_E@ with false for finished. This finishes the request (it is no longer active).
sendPickOptionResult(android.app.VoiceIn.FullName: public void sendPickOptionResult (Option[] selections, Bundle result)

ClassDesc: A request for the user to pick from a set of option, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#PickOptionRequest_E@.
